actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-149.
Measure called up by consent calendar in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 94-98.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An Act to amend the joint resolution of July 18, 1939 (53 Stat. 1062), to provide for the acceptance of additional lands for the Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt National Historic Site, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-149) Permits acceptance by the United States of title to any part of the Hyde Park estate and to any contiguous property located in the town of Hyde Park, New York, which shall be donated for use in connection with any designated governmental function in the administration of such area. Authorizes to be appropriated, in addition to such amounts as have been appropriated prior to the enactment of this Act, such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act but not to exceed $104,000 for development purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the joint resolution of July 18, 1939 (53 Stat. 1062), to provide for the acceptance of additional lands for the Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt National Historic Site.

An Act to amend the joint resolution of July 18, 1939 (53 Stat. 1062), to provide for the acceptance of additional lands for the Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
